html:
Interview Evaluation

{{doc.name}}







Interviewer: {% if doc.hr_interviewer_name %}{{ doc.hr_interviewer_name }}{% endif %} Date of Interview: {{ doc.hr_interview_date }}
Technical Interviewer: {% if doc.technical_interviewer_name %}{{ doc.technical_interviewer_name }}{% endif %} Position: {{ doc.applying_for_the_post }}
Interview evaluation forms are to be completed by the interviewer to rank the candidate’s overall qualifications for the position for which they have applied. Under each heading, the interviewer should give the candidate a numerical rating and write specific job-related comments in the space provided. The numerical rating system is based on the scale below.
Scale: 5 - Exceptional 4 - Above Average 3 - Average 2 - Satisfactory 1 - Unsatisfactory
Candidate Name: {{doc.candidate_name}} Remarks
Educational Background – Does the candidate have the appropriate educational qualifications or training for this position?

Comments:
{% if doc.comments_about_educational_background %}{{doc.comments_about_educational_background}}{% endif %}		 {% set number = doc.educational_background | int %} {% for i in range(number) %} {% endfor %}
Prior Work Experience – Has the candidate acquired similar skills or qualifications through past work experiences?

Comments:
{% if doc.comments_about_prior_work_experience %}{{doc.comments_about_prior_work_experience}}{% endif %}		 {% set number = doc.prior_work_experience | int %} {% for i in range(number) %} {% endfor %}
Technical Qualifications/Experience – Does the candidate have the technical skills necessary for this position?

Comments:
{% if doc.comments_about_technical_qualification %}{{doc.comments_about_technical_qualification}}{% endif %}		 {% set number = doc.technical_qualification | int %} {% for i in range(number) %} {% endfor %}
Verbal Communication – How were the candidate’s communication skills during the interview?

Comments:
{% if doc.comments_about_verbal_communication %}{{doc.comments_about_verbal_communication}}{% endif %}		 {% set number = doc.verbal_communication | int %} {% for i in range(number) %} {% endfor %}
Candidate Interest – How much interest did the candidate show in the position and the organization?

Comments:
{% if doc.comments_about_candidate_interest %}{{doc.comments_about_candidate_interest}}{% endif %}		 {% set number = doc.candidate_interest_5_out_of | int %} {% for i in range(number) %} {% endfor %}
Knowledge of Organization – Did the candidate research the organization prior to the interview?

Comments:
{% if doc.comments_about_knowledge_of_organization %}{{doc.comments_about_knowledge_of_organization}}{% endif %}		 {% set number = doc.knowledge_of_organization | int %} {% for i in range(number) %} {% endfor %}
Teambuilding/Interpersonal Skills – Did the candidate demonstrate, through their answers, good teambuilding/interpersonal skills?

Comments:
{% if doc.comments_about_teambuildinginterpersonal_skills %}{{doc.comments_about_teambuildinginterpersonal_skills}}{% endif %}		 {% set number = doc.teambuilding_interpersonal_skills | int %} {% for i in range(number) %} {% endfor %}
HR Overall Impression and Recommendation – Summary of your perceptions of the candidate’s strengths/weaknesses. Final comments and recommendations for proceeding with the candidate.

Comments:
{% if doc.comments_about_overall_impression_and_recommendation %}{{doc.comments_about_overall_impression_and_recommendation}}{% endif %}		 {{ doc.overall_impression_and_recommendation }}
Technical Overall Impression and Recommendation – Summary of your perceptions of the candidate’s strengths/weaknesses. Final comments and recommendations for proceeding with the candidate.

Comments:
